title: Bug 8142 - No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: I am encountering an issue related to the scoped type hierarchy on binary projects. I don't understand the problem completely.
OB: The observed behavior is not mentioned in the bug report.
EB: When I press F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. 'org.apache.ant'), I expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. However, I receive the message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant''. I would like to understand the meaning of this message as well.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a binary project. 2. Select a specific binary project (e.g. 'org.apache.ant'). 3. Press F4 to view the scoped type hierarchy. 4. Observe the resulting message.
